import React from "react"; import project1 from "../assets/images/project1.jpg"; import project2 from "../assets/images/project2.png"; import project3 from "../assets/images/project3.png"; import { FaEnvelope, FaWhatsapp, FaMapMarkerAlt } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaCheckCircle } from "react-icons/fa"; import { FaPaperPlane } from "react-icons/fa"; import { Brush, Code2, PenTool, Zap } from "lucide-react"; import { FaPhone, FaInstagram, FaGithub, FaDribbble, FaLinkedin } from "react-icons/fa"; import profileImage from "../assets/images/IMG-20231206-WA0022.jpg"; export default function AboutSection() { return (

{/* LEFT - Profile Image */}

About Me

Hi! I’m Dimas Faizal, a passionate designer and frontend developer based in Jakarta. With a background in visual design and a love for coding, I specialize in building websites and apps that are not only stunning but also user-friendly.

{/* SKILL SECTION */}
{["UI/UX Design", "Web Development", "Branding", "Motion Graphics"].map((skill, i) => ( {skill} ))}
{/* BUTTON - Let’s Connect */}
{/* ======= My Skills ======= */}
